t: Colin James: Colin James: Amazon.es: CD y vinilos}

t: Fifteen: Colin James
s: Had this on CD when it was released and grabbed a vinyl copy from Amazon when i heard it was being released on 180g. Super quiet album and two bonus tracks to boot. Great sound. Love his work with Joe Hardy and the tunes on Fifteen still sound as exciting as when I first heard him in 1988. ... 15..WOW....glad to hear some new stuff....the notes inside are short n' sweet....how the song became...can't wait to see the next show...Bonnie Raitt and Colin James ...

t: Sudden Stop (Audio Cassette): Colin James - Amazon.ca
s: A great example of Colin James in one of his earlier recordings. His strong vocals are matched by his excellent skills as a musician and guitarist. Great mix of blues and rock and roll flavour. Recommended. ... Lost my origianl cd. This was replacement.
